name: Music Grid
description:
In this game the players must keep going up, if you are in the lowest level of cubes for more than 3 seconds you will lose.

There are also power ups. Catching three of the same type will activate it, one slows your oponnent, the other removes the double jump ability from your opponent and the third one slows down or speeds up the song.

To play the game, just download, extract and execute MusicGrid.exe (:

Controls:

Player 1:

WASD - Movement

Space - Jump

Player 2:

Numpad 8 - up

Numpad 4 - left

Numpad 6 - right

Numpad 5 - down

Numpad 0 - Jump

Music and Artists:

All the music rights and respective credits go to these amazing guys! 

Artist - Song Name
LemKuuja - November

DELTA金TOPCO - Mary
